hello English learners welcome to daily
video vocabulary episode 75 in today's
episode I have a new word for you
abashed let's find out what it means and
how you can use it in your daily
conversation abashed have you ever felt
ashamed about something that you have
done or have you felt embarrassed by a
remark made at you the word of ashed
basically means to feel ashamed or
embarrassed by a situation when you feel
abashed it means you are ashamed about
something you have done or you feel
embarrassed when you find yourself in an
awkward situation you actually feel very
uneasy and self-conscious when you are
ashamed or embarrassed and you don't
know what to do or how to react to the
situation when someone is indifferent
and doesn't feel ashamed or embarrassed
it means they are unabashed
and have no regrets to what they have
done as the word of ashed describes a
person's feeling but being embarrassed
or ashamed it is an adjective
okay now that you know what abashed
means let's take a look at some example
sentences to see how you can use it in
your daily conversation
[Music]
example one Mary felt terribly abashed
as she had entered the men's restroom by
mistake example 2 the famous actress was
totally abashed when she found the media
outside her mansion as her secret affair
with a coaxial was public example 3
Natasha was speechless and abashed when
Peter told her that she had gained too
much weight and needed to get back in
shape example 4 I was abashed in front
of my date last night when I realized I
didn't have enough money to pay for the
dinner example 5 when the manager made
unusual physical advances at Michele she
just remained abashed and didn't know
how to react to it
[Music]
example 6 the financial projection and
the marketing plan failed miserably a
bashing all the executives who had
supported it example 7 at the meeting
when the manager mentioned about
everyone's salary raise except Williams
it left him feeling very abashed example
8 the mother told her daughter I can't
believe you cheated on your exam I'm
really abashed by you
example nine one should be simply
abashed to ask a question that could be
so easily answered with a simple google
search that's the end of today's episode
have you ever felt abashed with
something you have done or because of
something told to you by someone kindly
share your experiences in the comment
box below this video thank you for
watching us do watch all the episodes of
daily video vocabulary to better your
English language skills do subscribe to
our Channel and stay updated with all
the latest lessons I will see you again

till then bye and take care
